mapper.select: select * from event where to_date(#{date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') between to_date(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM event WHERE TO_DATE(start_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYY-MM')) AND TO_DATE(end_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_DATE(#{month}, 'YYYY-MM')
